dct_title_s: Route maritime de Tetuan a la Mecque
dct_alternative_sm: Route de la caravane de Maroc a Quibriche
Route de la carabne de Quibriche a la Mecque
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, islands off Mediterranean coast.
"195" at top right margin, "N ij" at bottom right margin, "Figure LXXV" at top middle margin.
Appears in Manesson-Mallet's Description de l'univers, Paris , first published 1683.
